tooltip.dynamicfullbright.world.scaling:
When enabled, light levels will be scaled to be between the specified minimum and maximum range.
When disabled, light levels outside the range will be clamped to it.
tooltip.dynamicfullbright.entity.separat:
When enabled, entity light levels will be adjusted independently of the world's light.
The entity light range is ignored when this is disabled.

To disable entity light scaling entirely: enable this setting then set min entity light to 0 and max to 15.
tooltip.dynamicfullbright.world.active:
Turns the mod on or off.
A keybind may be set for this toggle in the controls menu.
tooltip.dynamicfullbright.world.retain_a: Determines whether or not the mod will remember its on/off state when Minecraft is loaded.
